mapper.select: SELECT * from as_function WHERE id in (SELECT functionId FROM as_role_permission WHERE roleid=#{id})
mapper.sql: id, functionCode, functionName, creationTime, createdBy, lastUpdateTime, funcUrl, isStart, parentId
mapper.insert:

id,
functionCode,
functionName,
creationTime,
createdBy,
lastUpdateTime,
funcUrl,

mapper.update:
update as_function
functionCode = #{functioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
functionName = #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creationTime = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
funcUrl = #{funcurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isStart = #{isstart,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update as_function set functionCode = #{functioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, functionName = #{functionname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creationTime = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdBy = #{createdby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastUpdateTime = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, funcUrl = #{funcurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isStart = #{isstart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
